products.name: Anjeer
products.description: Anjeer, also known as dried figs, is a highly nutritious dry fruit popular for its sweet flavor and numerous health benefits.
products.descriptionHindi: Anjeer, also known as dried figs, is a highly nutritious dry fruit popular for its sweet flavor and numerous health benefits.
products.descriptionMarathi: Anjeer, also known as dried figs, is a highly nutritious dry fruit popular for its sweet flavor and numerous health benefits.
products.nutrients: Dried fruit, rich in dietary fiber, minerals like potassium, calcium, and iron, and antioxidants.
products.healthBenefits: Anjeer, or dried figs, are a nutrient-dense dry fruit valued for their high fiber, mineral, and antioxidant content. They offer numerous health benefits, from aiding digestion to supporting heart and bone health.
